title: Best of The Program | Guests: Matt Schlapp & Justin Haskins | 3/3/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss Texas Gov. Abbott’s decision to completely open the state and rescind the mask mandate. Glenn puts to rest the left’s lies and rumors about CPAC’s stage design as American Conservative Union Chairman Matt Schlapp joins with the full story. The Heartland Institute’s Justin Haskins talks the Great Reset, ESG scores, and the radicalization of America’s banks.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
